name: StieltjesFunction.measurable_measure
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
x‚úù : MeasurableSpace Œ±
f : Œ± ‚Üí StieltjesFunction
hf : ‚àÄ (q : Real), Measurable fun a => ‚Üë(f a) q
hf_bot : ‚àÄ (a : Œ±), Filter.Tendsto (‚Üë(f a)) Filter.atBot (nhds 0)
hf_top : ‚àÄ (a : Œ±), Filter.Tendsto (‚Üë(f a)) Filter.atTop (nhds 1)
‚ä¢ Measurable fun a => (f a).measure
decl:
/-- A measurable function `Œ± ‚Üí StieltjesFunction` with limits 0 at -‚àû and 1 at +‚àû gives a measurable
function `Œ± ‚Üí Measure ‚Ñù` by taking `StieltjesFunction.measure` at each point. -/
lemma StieltjesFunction.measurable_measure {Œ± : Type*} {_ : MeasurableSpace Œ±}
    {f : Œ± ‚Üí StieltjesFunction} (hf : ‚àÄ q, Measurable fun a ‚Ü¶ f a q)
    (hf_bot : ‚àÄ a, Tendsto (f a) atBot (ùìù 0))
    (hf_top : ‚àÄ a, Tendsto (f a) atTop (ùìù 1)) :
    Measurable fun a ‚Ü¶ (f a).measure :=
  have : ‚àÄ a, IsProbabilityMeasure (f a).measure :=
    fun a ‚Ü¶ (f a).isProbabilityMeasure (hf_bot a) (hf_top a)
  .measure_of_isPiSystem_of_isProbabilityMeasure (borel_eq_generateFrom_Iic ‚Ñù) isPiSystem_Iic <| by
    simp_rw [forall_mem_range, StieltjesFunction.measure_Iic (f _) (hf_bot _), sub_zero]
    exact fun _ ‚Ü¶ (hf _).ennreal_ofReal

name: ProbabilityTheory.IsRatStieltjesPoint.tendsto_atBot_zero
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1

a : Œ±
self : ProbabilityTheory.IsRatStieltjesPoint f a
‚ä¢ Filter.Tendsto (f a) Filter.atBot (nhds 0)
decl:
/-- `a : Œ±` is a Stieltjes point for `f : Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñö ‚Üí ‚Ñù` if `f a` is monotone with limit 0 at -‚àû
and 1 at +‚àû and satisfies a continuity property. -/
structure IsRatStieltjesPoint (f : Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñö ‚Üí ‚Ñù) (a : Œ±) : Prop where
  mono : Monotone (f a)
  tendsto_atTop_one : Tendsto (f a) atTop (ùìù 1)
  tendsto_atBot_zero : Tendsto (f a) atBot (ùìù 0)
  iInf_rat_gt_eq : ‚àÄ t : ‚Ñö, ‚®Ö r : Ioi t, f a r = f a t

structure IsRatStieltjesPoint (f : Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñö ‚Üí ‚Ñù) (a : Œ±) : Prop where

structure IsRatStieltjesPoint (f : Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñö ‚Üí ‚Ñù) (a : Œ±) : Prop where

and 1 at +‚àû and satisfies a continuity property. -/

name: ProbabilityTheory.isRatStieltjesPoint_unit_prod_iff
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
f : Œ± ‚Üí Rat ‚Üí Real
a : Œ±
‚ä¢ Iff (ProbabilityTheory.IsRatStieltjesPoint (fun p => f p.2) { fst := Unit.unit, snd := a }) (ProbabilityTheory.IsRatStieltjesPoint f a)
decl:
lemma isRatStieltjesPoint_unit_prod_iff (f : Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñö ‚Üí ‚Ñù) (a : Œ±) :
    IsRatStieltjesPoint (fun p : Unit √ó Œ± ‚Ü¶ f p.2) ((), a)
      ‚Üî IsRatStieltjesPoint f a := by
  constructor <;>
    exact fun h ‚Ü¶ ‚ü®h.mono, h.tendsto_atTop_one, h.tendsto_atBot_zero, h.iInf_rat_gt_eq‚ü©

name: ProbabilityTheory.measurableSet_isRatStieltjesPoint
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
f : Œ± ‚Üí Rat ‚Üí Real
inst‚úù : MeasurableSpace Œ±
hf : Measurable f
‚ä¢ MeasurableSet (setOf fun a => ProbabilityTheory.IsRatStieltjesPoint f a)
decl:
lemma measurableSet_isRatStieltjesPoint [MeasurableSpace Œ±] (hf : Measurable f) :
    MeasurableSet {a | IsRatStieltjesPoint f a} := by
  have h1 : MeasurableSet {a | Monotone (f a)} := by
    change MeasurableSet {a | ‚àÄ q r (_ : q ‚â§ r), f a q ‚â§ f a r}
    simp_rw [Set.setOf_forall]
    refine MeasurableSet.iInter (fun q ‚Ü¶ ?_)
    refine MeasurableSet.iInter (fun r ‚Ü¶ ?_)
    refine MeasurableSet.iInter (fun _ ‚Ü¶ ?_)
    exact measurableSet_le hf.eval hf.eval
  have h2 : MeasurableSet {a | Tendsto (f a) atTop (ùìù 1)} :=
    measurableSet_tendsto _ (fun q ‚Ü¶ hf.eval)
  have h3 : MeasurableSet {a | Tendsto (f a) atBot (ùìù 0)} :=
    measurableSet_tendsto _ (fun q ‚Ü¶ hf.eval)
  have h4 : MeasurableSet {a | ‚àÄ t : ‚Ñö, ‚®Ö r : Ioi t, f a r = f a t} := by
    rw [Set.setOf_forall]
    refine MeasurableSet.iInter (fun q ‚Ü¶ ?_)
    exact measurableSet_eq_fun (.iInf fun _ ‚Ü¶ hf.eval) hf.eval
  suffices {a | IsRatStieltjesPoint f a}
      = ({a | Monotone (f a)} ‚à© {a | Tendsto (f a) atTop (ùìù 1)} ‚à© {a | Tendsto (f a) atBot (ùìù 0)}
        ‚à© {a | ‚àÄ t : ‚Ñö, ‚®Ö r : Ioi t, f a r = f a t}) by
    rw [this]
    exact (((h1.inter h2).inter h3).inter h4)
  ext a
  simp only [mem_setOf_eq, mem_inter_iff]
  refine ‚ü®fun h ‚Ü¶ ?_, fun h ‚Ü¶ ?_‚ü©
  ¬∑ exact ‚ü®‚ü®‚ü®h.mono, h.tendsto_atTop_one‚ü©, h.tendsto_atBot_zero‚ü©, h.iInf_rat_gt_eq‚ü©
  ¬∑ exact ‚ü®h.1.1.1, h.1.1.2, h.1.2, h.2‚ü©

name: ProbabilityTheory.IsRatStieltjesPoint.ite
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
f g : Œ± ‚Üí Rat ‚Üí Real
a : Œ±
p : Œ± ‚Üí Prop
inst‚úù : DecidablePred p
hf : p a ‚Üí ProbabilityTheory.IsRatStieltjesPoint f a
hg : Not (p a) ‚Üí ProbabilityTheory.IsRatStieltjesPoint g a
‚ä¢ ProbabilityTheory.IsRatStieltjesPoint (fun a => ite (p a) (f a) (g a)) a
decl:
lemma IsRatStieltjesPoint.ite {f g : Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñö ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {a : Œ±} (p : Œ± ‚Üí Prop) [DecidablePred p]
    (hf : p a ‚Üí IsRatStieltjesPoint f a) (hg : ¬¨ p a ‚Üí IsRatStieltjesPoint g a) :
    IsRatStieltjesPoint (fun a ‚Ü¶ if p a then f a else g a) a where
  mono := by split_ifs with h; exacts [(hf h).mono, (hg h).mono]
  tendsto_atTop_one := by
    split_ifs with h; exacts [(hf h).tendsto_atTop_one, (hg h).tendsto_atTop_one]
  tendsto_atBot_zero := by
    split_ifs with h; exacts [(hf h).tendsto_atBot_zero, (hg h).tendsto_atBot_zero]
  iInf_rat_gt_eq := by split_ifs with h; exacts [(hf h).iInf_rat_gt_eq, (hg h).iInf_rat_gt_eq]

name: ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.isRatStieltjesPoint
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
inst‚úù : MeasurableSpace Œ±
f : Œ± ‚Üí Rat ‚Üí Real
self : ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF f
a : Œ±
‚ä¢ ProbabilityTheory.IsRatStieltjesPoint f a
decl:
/-- A function `f : Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñö ‚Üí ‚Ñù` is a (kernel) rational cumulative distribution function if it is
measurable in the first argument and if `f a` satisfies a list of properties for all `a : Œ±`:
monotonicity between 0 at -‚àû and 1 at +‚àû and a form of continuity.

A function with these properties can be extended to a measurable function `Œ± ‚Üí StieltjesFunction`.
See `ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunction`.
-/
structure IsMeasurableRatCDF (f : Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñö ‚Üí ‚Ñù) : Prop where
  isRatStieltjesPoint : ‚àÄ a, IsRatStieltjesPoint f a
  measurable : Measurable f

name: ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.measurable
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
inst‚úù : MeasurableSpace Œ±
f : Œ± ‚Üí Rat ‚Üí Real
self : ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF f
‚ä¢ Measurable f
decl:
/-- A function `f : Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñö ‚Üí ‚Ñù` is a (kernel) rational cumulative distribution function if it is
measurable in the first argument and if `f a` satisfies a list of properties for all `a : Œ±`:
monotonicity between 0 at -‚àû and 1 at +‚àû and a form of continuity.

A function with these properties can be extended to a measurable function `Œ± ‚Üí StieltjesFunction`.
See `ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunction`.
-/
structure IsMeasurableRatCDF (f : Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñö ‚Üí ‚Ñù) : Prop where
  isRatStieltjesPoint : ‚àÄ a, IsRatStieltjesPoint f a
  measurable : Measurable f

name: ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.nonneg
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
inst‚úù : MeasurableSpace Œ±
f : Œ± ‚Üí Rat ‚Üí Real
hf : ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF f
a : Œ±
q : Rat
‚ä¢ LE.le 0 (f a q)
decl:
lemma IsMeasurableRatCDF.nonneg {f : Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñö ‚Üí ‚Ñù} (hf : IsMeasurableRatCDF f) (a : Œ±) (q : ‚Ñö) :
    0 ‚â§ f a q :=
  Monotone.le_of_tendsto (hf.isRatStieltjesPoint a).mono
    (hf.isRatStieltjesPoint a).tendsto_atBot_zero q

name: ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.le_one
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
inst‚úù : MeasurableSpace Œ±
f : Œ± ‚Üí Rat ‚Üí Real
hf : ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF f
a : Œ±
q : Rat
‚ä¢ LE.le (f a q) 1
decl:
lemma IsMeasurableRatCDF.le_one {f : Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñö ‚Üí ‚Ñù} (hf : IsMeasurableRatCDF f) (a : Œ±) (q : ‚Ñö) :
    f a q ‚â§ 1 :=
  Monotone.ge_of_tendsto (hf.isRatStieltjesPoint a).mono
    (hf.isRatStieltjesPoint a).tendsto_atTop_one q

name: ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.tendsto_atTop_one
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1

f : Œ± ‚Üí Rat ‚Üí Real

a : Œ±
‚ä¢ Filter.Tendsto (f a) Filter.atTop (nhds 1)
decl:
lemma IsMeasurableRatCDF.tendsto_atTop_one {f : Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñö ‚Üí ‚Ñù} (hf : IsMeasurableRatCDF f) (a : Œ±) :
    Tendsto (f a) atTop (ùìù 1) := (hf.isRatStieltjesPoint a).tendsto_atTop_one

initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1

lemma IsMeasurableRatCDF.tendsto_atBot_zero {f : Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñö ‚Üí ‚Ñù} (hf : IsMeasurableRatCDF f) (a : Œ±) :
    Tendsto (f a) atBot (ùìù 0) := (hf.isRatStieltjesPoint a).tendsto_atBot_zero

initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1

lemma IsMeasurableRatCDF.iInf_rat_gt_eq {f : Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñö ‚Üí ‚Ñù} (hf : IsMeasurableRatCDF f) (a : Œ±)
    (q : ‚Ñö) :
    ‚®Ö r : Ioi q, f a r = f a q := (hf.isRatStieltjesPoint a).iInf_rat_gt_eq q

name: ProbabilityTheory.monotone_defaultRatCDF
initialProofState: ‚ä¢ Monotone ProbabilityTheory.defaultRatCDF
decl:
lemma monotone_defaultRatCDF : Monotone defaultRatCDF := by
  unfold defaultRatCDF
  intro x y hxy
  dsimp only
  split_ifs with h_1 h_2 h_2
  exacts [le_rfl, zero_le_one, absurd (hxy.trans_lt h_2) h_1, le_rfl]

name: ProbabilityTheory.defaultRatCDF_nonneg
initialProofState:
q : Rat
‚ä¢ LE.le 0 (ProbabilityTheory.defaultRatCDF q)
decl:
lemma defaultRatCDF_nonneg (q : ‚Ñö) : 0 ‚â§ defaultRatCDF q := by
  unfold defaultRatCDF
  split_ifs
  exacts [le_rfl, zero_le_one]

name: ProbabilityTheory.defaultRatCDF_le_one
initialProofState:
q : Rat
‚ä¢ LE.le (ProbabilityTheory.defaultRatCDF q) 1
decl:
lemma defaultRatCDF_le_one (q : ‚Ñö) : defaultRatCDF q ‚â§ 1 := by
  unfold defaultRatCDF
  split_ifs <;> simp

name: ProbabilityTheory.tendsto_defaultRatCDF_atTop
initialProofState: ‚ä¢ Filter.Tendsto ProbabilityTheory.defaultRatCDF Filter.atTop (nhds 1)
decl:
lemma tendsto_defaultRatCDF_atTop : Tendsto defaultRatCDF atTop (ùìù 1) := by
  refine (tendsto_congr' ?_).mp tendsto_const_nhds
  rw [EventuallyEq, eventually_atTop]
  exact ‚ü®0, fun q hq => (if_neg (not_lt.mpr hq)).symm‚ü©

name: ProbabilityTheory.tendsto_defaultRatCDF_atBot
initialProofState: ‚ä¢ Filter.Tendsto ProbabilityTheory.defaultRatCDF Filter.atBot (nhds 0)
decl:
lemma tendsto_defaultRatCDF_atBot : Tendsto defaultRatCDF atBot (ùìù 0) := by
  refine (tendsto_congr' ?_).mp tendsto_const_nhds
  rw [EventuallyEq, eventually_atBot]
  refine ‚ü®-1, fun q hq => (if_pos (hq.trans_lt ?_)).symm‚ü©
  linarith

name: ProbabilityTheory.iInf_rat_gt_defaultRatCDF
initialProofState:
t : Rat
‚ä¢ Eq (iInf fun r => ProbabilityTheory.defaultRatCDF ‚Üër) (ProbabilityTheory.defaultRatCDF t)
decl:
lemma iInf_rat_gt_defaultRatCDF (t : ‚Ñö) :
    ‚®Ö r : Ioi t, defaultRatCDF r = defaultRatCDF t := by
  simp only [defaultRatCDF]
  have h_bdd : BddBelow (range fun r : ‚Ü•(Ioi t) ‚Ü¶ ite ((r : ‚Ñö) < 0) (0 : ‚Ñù) 1) := by
    refine ‚ü®0, fun x hx ‚Ü¶ ?_‚ü©
    obtain ‚ü®y, rfl‚ü© := mem_range.mpr hx
    dsimp only
    split_ifs
    exacts [le_rfl, zero_le_one]
  split_ifs with h
  ¬∑ refine le_antisymm ?_ (le_ciInf fun x ‚Ü¶ ?_)
    ¬∑ obtain ‚ü®q, htq, hq_neg‚ü© : ‚àÉ q, t < q ‚àß q < 0 := ‚ü®t / 2, by linarith, by linarith‚ü©
      refine (ciInf_le h_bdd ‚ü®q, htq‚ü©).trans ?_
      rw [if_pos]
      rwa [Subtype.coe_mk]
    ¬∑ split_ifs
      exacts [le_rfl, zero_le_one]
  ¬∑ refine le_antisymm ?_ ?_
    ¬∑ refine (ciInf_le h_bdd ‚ü®t + 1, lt_add_one t‚ü©).trans ?_
      split_ifs
      exacts [zero_le_one, le_rfl]
    ¬∑ refine le_ciInf fun x ‚Ü¶ ?_
      rw [if_neg]
      rw [not_lt] at h ‚ä¢
      exact h.trans (mem_Ioi.mp x.prop).le

name: ProbabilityTheory.isRatStieltjesPoint_defaultRatCDF
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
a : Œ±
‚ä¢ ProbabilityTheory.IsRatStieltjesPoint (fun x => ProbabilityTheory.defaultRatCDF) a
decl:
lemma isRatStieltjesPoint_defaultRatCDF (a : Œ±) :
    IsRatStieltjesPoint (fun (_ : Œ±) ‚Ü¶ defaultRatCDF) a where
  mono := monotone_defaultRatCDF
  tendsto_atTop_one := tendsto_defaultRatCDF_atTop
  tendsto_atBot_zero := tendsto_defaultRatCDF_atBot
  iInf_rat_gt_eq := iInf_rat_gt_defaultRatCDF

name: ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF_defaultRatCDF
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_2
inst‚úù : MeasurableSpace Œ±
‚ä¢ ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF fun x q => ProbabilityTheory.defaultRatCDF q
decl:
lemma IsMeasurableRatCDF_defaultRatCDF (Œ± : Type*) [MeasurableSpace Œ±] :
    IsMeasurableRatCDF (fun (_ : Œ±) (q : ‚Ñö) ‚Ü¶ defaultRatCDF q) where
  isRatStieltjesPoint := isRatStieltjesPoint_defaultRatCDF
  measurable := measurable_const

name: ProbabilityTheory.toRatCDF_of_isRatStieltjesPoint
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
f : Œ± ‚Üí Rat ‚Üí Real
a : Œ±
h : ProbabilityTheory.IsRatStieltjesPoint f a
q : Rat
‚ä¢ Eq (ProbabilityTheory.toRatCDF f a q) (f a q)
decl:
lemma toRatCDF_of_isRatStieltjesPoint {a : Œ±} (h : IsRatStieltjesPoint f a) (q : ‚Ñö) :
    toRatCDF f a q = f a q := by
  rw [toRatCDF, if_pos h]

name: ProbabilityTheory.toRatCDF_unit_prod
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
f : Œ± ‚Üí Rat ‚Üí Real
a : Œ±
‚ä¢ Eq (ProbabilityTheory.toRatCDF (fun p => f p.2) { fst := Unit.unit, snd := a }) (ProbabilityTheory.toRatCDF f a)
decl:
lemma toRatCDF_unit_prod (a : Œ±) :
    toRatCDF (fun (p : Unit √ó Œ±) ‚Ü¶ f p.2) ((), a) = toRatCDF f a := by
  unfold toRatCDF
  rw [isRatStieltjesPoint_unit_prod_iff]

name: ProbabilityTheory.measurable_toRatCDF
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
f : Œ± ‚Üí Rat ‚Üí Real
inst‚úù : MeasurableSpace Œ±
hf : Measurable f
‚ä¢ Measurable (ProbabilityTheory.toRatCDF f)
decl:
lemma measurable_toRatCDF (hf : Measurable f) : Measurable (toRatCDF f) :=
  Measurable.ite (measurableSet_isRatStieltjesPoint hf) hf measurable_const

name: ProbabilityTheory.isMeasurableRatCDF_toRatCDF
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
f : Œ± ‚Üí Rat ‚Üí Real
inst‚úù : MeasurableSpace Œ±
hf : Measurable f
‚ä¢ ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF (ProbabilityTheory.toRatCDF f)
decl:
lemma isMeasurableRatCDF_toRatCDF (hf : Measurable f) :
    IsMeasurableRatCDF (toRatCDF f) where
  isRatStieltjesPoint a := by
    classical
    exact IsRatStieltjesPoint.ite (IsRatStieltjesPoint f) id
      (fun _ ‚Ü¶ isRatStieltjesPoint_defaultRatCDF a)
  measurable := measurable_toRatCDF hf

name: ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux_def
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_2
f : Œ± ‚Üí Rat ‚Üí Real
a : Œ±
x : Real
‚ä¢ Eq (ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux f a x) (iInf fun q => f a ‚Üëq)
decl:
/-- Auxiliary definition for `IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunction`: turn `f : Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñö ‚Üí ‚Ñù` into
a function `Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù` by assigning to `f a x` the infimum of `f a q` over `q : ‚Ñö` with `x < q`. -/
noncomputable irreducible_def IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux (f : Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñö ‚Üí ‚Ñù) :
    Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù :=
  fun a x ‚Ü¶ ‚®Ö q : { q' : ‚Ñö // x < q' }, f a q

name: ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux_def'
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
f : Œ± ‚Üí Rat ‚Üí Real
a : Œ±
‚ä¢ Eq (ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux f a) fun t => iInf fun r => f a ‚Üër
decl:
lemma IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux_def' (f : Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñö ‚Üí ‚Ñù) (a : Œ±) :
    IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux f a
      = fun (t : ‚Ñù) ‚Ü¶ ‚®Ö r : { r' : ‚Ñö // t < r' }, f a r := by
  ext t; exact IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux_def f a t

initialProofState:

a : Œ±
‚ä¢ Eq (ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux (fun p => f p.2) { fst := Unit.unit, snd := a }) (ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux f a)
decl:
lemma IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux_unit_prod {f : Œ± ‚Üí ‚Ñö ‚Üí ‚Ñù} (a : Œ±) :
    IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux (fun (p : Unit √ó Œ±) ‚Ü¶ f p.2) ((), a)
      = IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux f a := by
  simp_rw [IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux_def']

name: ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux_eq
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
f : Œ± ‚Üí Rat ‚Üí Real
inst‚úù : MeasurableSpace Œ±
hf : ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF f
a : Œ±
r : Rat
‚ä¢ Eq (ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux f a ‚Üër) (f a r)
decl:
lemma IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux_eq (a : Œ±) (r : ‚Ñö) :
    IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux f a r = f a r := by
  rw [‚Üê hf.iInf_rat_gt_eq a r, IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux]
  refine Equiv.iInf_congr ?_ ?_
  ¬∑ exact
      { toFun := fun t ‚Ü¶ ‚ü®t.1, mod_cast t.2‚ü©
        invFun := fun t ‚Ü¶ ‚ü®t.1, mod_cast t.2‚ü©
        left_inv := fun t ‚Ü¶ by simp only [Subtype.coe_eta]
        right_inv := fun t ‚Ü¶ by simp only [Subtype.coe_eta] }
  ¬∑ intro t
    simp only [Equiv.coe_fn_mk, Subtype.coe_mk]

name: ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux_nonneg
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
f : Œ± ‚Üí Rat ‚Üí Real
inst‚úù : MeasurableSpace Œ±
hf : ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF f
a : Œ±
r : Real
‚ä¢ LE.le 0 (ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux f a r)
decl:
lemma IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux_nonneg (a : Œ±) (r : ‚Ñù) :
    0 ‚â§ IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux f a r := by
  have : Nonempty { r' : ‚Ñö // r < ‚Üër' } := by
    obtain ‚ü®r, hrx‚ü© := exists_rat_gt r
    exact ‚ü®‚ü®r, hrx‚ü©‚ü©
  rw [IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux_def]
  exact le_ciInf fun r' ‚Ü¶ hf.nonneg a _

name: ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.monotone_stieltjesFunctionAux
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
f : Œ± ‚Üí Rat ‚Üí Real
inst‚úù : MeasurableSpace Œ±
hf : ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF f
a : Œ±
‚ä¢ Monotone (ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux f a)
decl:
lemma IsMeasurableRatCDF.monotone_stieltjesFunctionAux (a : Œ±) :
    Monotone (IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux f a) := by
  intro x y hxy
  have : Nonempty { r' : ‚Ñö // y < ‚Üër' } := by
    obtain ‚ü®r, hrx‚ü© := exists_rat_gt y
    exact ‚ü®‚ü®r, hrx‚ü©‚ü©
  simp_rw [IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux_def]
  refine le_ciInf fun r ‚Ü¶ (ciInf_le ?_ ?_).trans_eq ?_
  ¬∑ refine ‚ü®0, fun z ‚Ü¶ ?_‚ü©; rintro ‚ü®u, rfl‚ü©; exact hf.nonneg a _
  ¬∑ exact ‚ü®r.1, hxy.trans_lt r.prop‚ü©
  ¬∑ rfl

name: ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.continuousWithinAt_stieltjesFunctionAux_Ici
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
f : Œ± ‚Üí Rat ‚Üí Real
inst‚úù : MeasurableSpace Œ±
hf : ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF f
a : Œ±
x : Real
‚ä¢ ContinuousWithinAt (ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux f a) (Set.Ici x) x
decl:
lemma IsMeasurableRatCDF.continuousWithinAt_stieltjesFunctionAux_Ici (a : Œ±) (x : ‚Ñù) :
    ContinuousWithinAt (IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux f a) (Ici x) x := by
  rw [‚Üê continuousWithinAt_Ioi_iff_Ici]
  convert Monotone.tendsto_nhdsGT (monotone_stieltjesFunctionAux hf a) x
  rw [sInf_image']
  have h' : ‚®Ö r : Ioi x, stieltjesFunctionAux f a r
      = ‚®Ö r : { r' : ‚Ñö // x < r' }, stieltjesFunctionAux f a r := by
    refine Real.iInf_Ioi_eq_iInf_rat_gt x ?_ (monotone_stieltjesFunctionAux hf a)
    refine ‚ü®0, fun z ‚Ü¶ ?_‚ü©
    rintro ‚ü®u, -, rfl‚ü©
    exact stieltjesFunctionAux_nonneg hf a u
  have h'' :
    ‚®Ö r : { r' : ‚Ñö // x < r' }, stieltjesFunctionAux f a r =
      ‚®Ö r : { r' : ‚Ñö // x < r' }, f a r := by
    congr with r
    exact stieltjesFunctionAux_eq hf a r
  rw [h', h'', ContinuousWithinAt]
  congr!
  rw [stieltjesFunctionAux_def]

name: ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunction_le_one
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1

‚ä¢ LE.le (‚Üë(hf.stieltjesFunction a) x) 1
decl:
lemma IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunction_le_one (a : Œ±) (x : ‚Ñù) :
    hf.stieltjesFunction a x ‚â§ 1 := by
  obtain ‚ü®r, hrx‚ü© := exists_rat_gt x
  rw [‚Üê StieltjesFunction.iInf_rat_gt_eq]
  simp_rw [IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunction_eq]
  refine ciInf_le_of_le ?_ ?_ (hf.le_one _ _)

name: ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.tendsto_stieltjesFunction_atBot
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
f : Œ± ‚Üí Rat ‚Üí Real
inst‚úù : MeasurableSpace Œ±
hf : ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF f
a : Œ±
‚ä¢ Filter.Tendsto (‚Üë(hf.stieltjesFunction a)) Filter.atBot (nhds 0)
decl:
lemma IsMeasurableRatCDF.tendsto_stieltjesFunction_atBot (a : Œ±) :
    Tendsto (hf.stieltjesFunction a) atBot (ùìù 0) := by
  have h_exists : ‚àÄ x : ‚Ñù, ‚àÉ q : ‚Ñö, x < q ‚àß ‚Üëq < x + 1 := fun x ‚Ü¶ exists_rat_btwn (lt_add_one x)
  let qs : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñö := fun x ‚Ü¶ (h_exists x).choose
  have hqs_tendsto : Tendsto qs atBot atBot := by
    rw [tendsto_atBot_atBot]
    refine fun q ‚Ü¶ ‚ü®q - 1, fun y hy ‚Ü¶ ?_‚ü©
    have h_le : ‚Üë(qs y) ‚â§ (q : ‚Ñù) - 1 + 1 :=
      (h_exists y).choose_spec.2.le.trans (add_le_add hy le_rfl)
    rw [sub_add_cancel] at h_le
    exact mod_cast h_le
  refine tendsto_of_tendsto_of_tendsto_of_le_of_le tendsto_const_nhds
    ((hf.tendsto_atBot_zero a).comp hqs_tendsto) (stieltjesFunction_nonneg hf a) fun x ‚Ü¶ ?_
  rw [Function.comp_apply, ‚Üê stieltjesFunction_eq hf]
  exact (hf.stieltjesFunction a).mono (h_exists x).choose_spec.1.le

name: ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.tendsto_stieltjesFunction_atTop
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
f : Œ± ‚Üí Rat ‚Üí Real
inst‚úù : MeasurableSpace Œ±
hf : ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF f
a : Œ±
‚ä¢ Filter.Tendsto (‚Üë(hf.stieltjesFunction a)) Filter.atTop (nhds 1)
decl:
lemma IsMeasurableRatCDF.tendsto_stieltjesFunction_atTop (a : Œ±) :
    Tendsto (hf.stieltjesFunction a) atTop (ùìù 1) := by
  have h_exists : ‚àÄ x : ‚Ñù, ‚àÉ q : ‚Ñö, x - 1 < q ‚àß ‚Üëq < x := fun x ‚Ü¶ exists_rat_btwn (sub_one_lt x)
  let qs : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñö := fun x ‚Ü¶ (h_exists x).choose
  have hqs_tendsto : Tendsto qs atTop atTop := by
    rw [tendsto_atTop_atTop]
    refine fun q ‚Ü¶ ‚ü®q + 1, fun y hy ‚Ü¶ ?_‚ü©
    have h_le : y - 1 ‚â§ qs y := (h_exists y).choose_spec.1.le
    rw [sub_le_iff_le_add] at h_le
    exact_mod_cast le_of_add_le_add_right (hy.trans h_le)
  refine tendsto_of_tendsto_of_tendsto_of_le_of_le ((hf.tendsto_atTop_one a).comp hqs_tendsto)
      tendsto_const_nhds ?_ (stieltjesFunction_le_one hf a)
  intro x
  rw [Function.comp_apply, ‚Üê stieltjesFunction_eq hf]
  exact (hf.stieltjesFunction a).mono (le_of_lt (h_exists x).choose_spec.2)

name: ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.measurable_stieltjesFunction
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1
f : Œ± ‚Üí Rat ‚Üí Real
inst‚úù : MeasurableSpace Œ±
hf : ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF f
x : Real
‚ä¢ Measurable fun a => ‚Üë(hf.stieltjesFunction a) x
decl:
lemma IsMeasurableRatCDF.measurable_stieltjesFunction (x : ‚Ñù) :
    Measurable fun a ‚Ü¶ hf.stieltjesFunction a x := by
  have : (fun a ‚Ü¶ hf.stieltjesFunction a x) = fun a ‚Ü¶ ‚®Ö r : { r' : ‚Ñö // x < r' }, f a ‚Üër := by
    ext1 a
    rw [‚Üê StieltjesFunction.iInf_rat_gt_eq]
    congr with q
    rw [stieltjesFunction_eq]
  rw [this]
  exact .iInf (fun q ‚Ü¶ hf.measurable.eval)

initialProofState:

decl:
lemma IsMeasurableRatCDF.measure_stieltjesFunction_Iic (a : Œ±) (x : ‚Ñù) :
    (hf.stieltjesFunction a).measure (Iic x) = ENNReal.ofReal (hf.stieltjesFunction a x) := by
  rw [‚Üê sub_zero (hf.stieltjesFunction a x)]
  exact (hf.stieltjesFunction a).measure_Iic (tendsto_stieltjesFunction_atBot hf a) _

name: ProbabilityTheory.IsMeasurableRatCDF.measure_stieltjesFunction_univ
initialProofState:

decl:
lemma IsMeasurableRatCDF.measure_stieltjesFunction_univ (a : Œ±) :
    (hf.stieltjesFunction a).measure univ = 1 := by
  rw [‚Üê ENNReal.ofReal_one, ‚Üê sub_zero (1 : ‚Ñù)]
  exact StieltjesFunction.measure_univ _ (tendsto_stieltjesFunction_atBot hf a)
    (tendsto_stieltjesFunction_atTop hf a)

initialProofState:

name: ProbabilityTheory.stieltjesOfMeasurableRat_unit_prod
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_1

a : Œ±

decl:
lemma stieltjesOfMeasurableRat_unit_prod (hf : Measurable f) (a : Œ±) :
    stieltjesOfMeasurableRat (fun (p : Unit √ó Œ±) ‚Ü¶ f p.2) (hf.comp measurable_snd) ((), a)
      = stieltjesOfMeasurableRat f hf a := by

    ‚Üê IsMeasurableRatCDF.stieltjesFunctionAux_unit_prod a]
